snippet.title: Post Hero Trailer
snippet.description:
Post Hero is an adventure game in the classic style of Sierra Online games where you play as a mail carrier on his first day on the job. What should be a walk in the park turns out to be anything but. Who knew you'd need to outsmart a vampire, help someone change a flat tire, foil a porch pirate, save a relationship and learn magic just to drop off some packages? All of this and more awaits you in Post Hero!

Available now: https://scenicroutesoftware.itch.io/post-hero
